createClient¶

class cpaassdk.client.Client(credentials)¶

Configure the SDK with client_id and client_secret.

Example:

client = Client({
  'client_id': '<private project key>',
  'client_secret': '<private project secret>',
  'base_url': '<base url>'
})
Parameters

  • params (dict) – Single parameter to hold all options

  • params['client_id'] (str) – Private project key.

  • params['client_secret'] (str) – Private project secret.

  • params['base_url'] (str) – JSON url of the server to be used.
